t: Amazon Fire TV - Wikipedia
s: 2 days ago - Amazon Fire TV (formerly stylized as amazon fireTV) is a line of digital media players and microconsoles developed by Amazon since November 2014. The devices are small network appliances that deliver digital audio and video content streamed via the Internet to a connected high-definition television.

t: Amazon Fire TVs - Best Buy
s: The most important thing when setting up your new Amazon Fire television is connecting it to the internet. Ideally, you want a hardwired connection to your home network. Wi-Fi will work, but wireless speeds can vary and affect your resolution quality.
